Texts.Chs: 把^green;吐舌娃妈妈的爪子^reset;带给我。 (位于^orange;我的度假屋^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Poptop Claw^reset; to me at my ^orange;vacation house^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我听说，有一只巨大的凶猛野兽潜伏在^green;翠绿矿坑^reset;。你能为了大家的安全把它赶走吗？
Texts.Eng: I've heard that there is a rather large and aggressive beast lurking in the ^green;lush mines^reset;. Perhaps you could take it out for the safety of all?

Texts.Chs: 做得好！我们也取得了一个可怕的战利品。这点钱是给你的报酬。
Texts.Eng: Well done. And a grisly trophy of your victory, too! Have a bit of spending cash for the effort.
